review: Very easy to set up and use. Works on any TV with a USB port.
author: Joseph Andrew Luck

review: Very simple set-up!  Have not used yet, but seems straight forward. A nice device for the money!
author: David C. Meling

review: Great for cutting cable. But make sure you unplug when not using it because it still connects to the Internet and chews up the data
author: S. Brigger

review: So easy to use and install I love it
author: Vivian O.

review: Easy set up. Works as advertised. Very pleased.
author: Mario Molinari

review: Have had nothing but issues going to be sending it back soon as I get some free time. Drops shows and music and can't find wifi yet everything else works fine.
author: Ken Lair

review: I love the Amazon Fire TV Stick!!  It has more than blown me away with the cool features!  AMAZING!!
author: David Voy

review: It works great, just Amazon Prime has to pay extra for most, not happy with that.
author: david b payne
